# w-spoiler



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                 | Type                             | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `label`  | `label`   | label of the spoiler        | `string`                         | `undefined` |
| `size`   | `size`    | set the size of the spoiler | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `'medium'`  |


## Events

| Event    | Description                     | Type                |
| -------- | ------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `wClose` | emit when the spoiler is closed | `CustomEvent<void>` |
| `wOpen`  | emit when the spoiler is opened | `CustomEvent<void>` |
